ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Storm Shadow and his allies escape the community center by disguising themselves as Cobra agents. In Darklonia, Sneak-Peek dies of his injuries. Doctor Venom settles himself into Doctor Mindbender's body, beginning by shaving the mustache, donning a hairpiece and reintroducing himself to Cobra Commander.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 15:30:08. [CVDB604916] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:55. [Issue ID 1719072]
